item.title: Friendly Ways of Reminding Your Straight White Cisgendered Male Friends of Their Privilege
item.description:
It’s embarrassing - nay, shameful - to admit in 2019 that you still haven’t replaced your entire friend group with the underprivileged.

But before you go to delete their phone numbers, block them on Insta and accuse them of secretly voting for Drumpf (barf!), don’t miss the opportunity to remind them to be ashamed of the unchangeable aspects of their identity.
